overview:
Rajesh Sidharthan is a product designer who lives in the San Francisco bay area.

Key Strengths

+ Self-directed veteran with 13 years of experience in making products work
+ Recognized ability to lead negotiations with development, executives and customers
+ Proven track record in leading cross functional User Experience teams
+ Excellence in delivering products in fast paced environments with changing priorities
+ Technically sound with the ability to quickly gain domain knowledge and drive design to solve business problems

Domain Expertise

+ Social Media for business
+ Content Management - (ECM, DAM, WCM, RM and Imaging)
+ On-demand software (SaaS, PaaS)
+ Platform tools and enabling technologies
+ Customer support software
+ Consumer websites
